sqls.sql: select count(id) as notifyCount from NotifyMessage where toUserId=#{userId} and isread = 0
select distinct b.name from usertrip a ,custom b where a.visitCustomId = b.id and a.userId= #{userId} and visitDate = curdate()

select * from ( select id,name,birthday,datediff(concat(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y'),right(birthday,6)),curdate()) as daycount,'1' as remindType from custom where userId=#{userId}) aa where daycount < 8 and daycount >= 0

select * from(select id,name,carExpireDate,date_sub(carExpireDate,interval 3 month) as toubaoDate,datediff(curdate(),date_sub(date_sub(carExpireDate,interval 3 month),interval 7 day)) as daycount,'2' as remindType from custom where userId=#{userId}) aa where daycount >=0

select * from (select a.id,a.name,b.day,b.context,datediff(curdate(),concat(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y'),right(b.day,6))) as daycount,'3' as remindType from custom a join customimportanceday b on a.id=b.customId where a.userId=#{userId}) aa where daycount<4

select aaa.*,bbb.name,bbb.level from( select case when usertripid is null then 'plan' else 'trip' end as idtype, case when usertripid is null then plandate else tripDate end as tripdate, case when usertripid is null then customid else visitcustomid end as customid from( (select distinct a.id as usertripId,a.visitCustomId,left(a.visitDate,7) as tripDate from usertrip a where a.userid=#{userId} and a.state=1 and left(a.visittime,7)='${month}') aa left join (select id as planid ,customId,plandate from userplan where userid=#{userId} and plandate ='${month}') bb on aa.visitCustomId=bb.customId ) UNION select case when usertripid is null then 'plan' else 'trip' end as idtype, case when usertripid is null then plandate else tripDate end as tripdate, case when usertripid is null then customid else visitcustomid end as customid from( (select distinct a.id as usertripId,a.visitCustomId,left(a.visitDate,7) as tripDate from usertrip a where a.userid=#{userId} and a.state=1 and left(a.visittime,7)='${month}') aa right join (select id as planid ,customId,plandate from userplan where userid=#{userId} and plandate ='${month}') bb on aa.visitCustomId=bb.customId ) ) aaa join custom bbb on aaa.customid=bbb.id

select bbb.level,count(bbb.level) as customcount from( select case when usertripid is null then 'plan' else 'trip' end as idtype, case when usertripid is null then plandate else tripDate end as tripdate, case when usertripid is null then customid else visitcustomid end as customid from( (select distinct a.id as usertripId,a.visitCustomId,left(a.visitDate,7) as tripDate from usertrip a where a.userid=#{userId} and a.state=1 and left(a.visittime,7)='${month}') aa left join (select id as planid ,customId,plandate from userplan where userid=#{userId} and plandate ='${month}') bb on aa.visitCustomId=bb.customId ) UNION select case when usertripid is null then 'plan' else 'trip' end as idtype, case when usertripid is null then plandate else tripDate end as tripdate, case when usertripid is null then customid else visitcustomid end as customid from( (select distinct a.id as usertripId,a.visitCustomId,left(a.visitDate,7) as tripDate from usertrip a where a.userid=#{userId} and a.state=1 and left(a.visittime,7)='${month}') aa right join (select id as planid ,customId,plandate from userplan where userid=#{userId} and plandate ='${month}') bb on aa.visitCustomId=bb.customId ) ) aaa join custom bbb on aaa.customid=bbb.id group by level
